actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide authorization of activities and appropriations for the Department of the Interior for the period commencing July 1, 1976, and ending on September 30, 1976, in conformance to the requirements of section 502(a) of the Congressional Budget and Impoundment Control Act of 1974 (P.L. 93-344).

summary.text: Authorizes the continuation of activities and appropriations for the Department of the Interior for the period commencing July 1, 1976, and ending September 30, 1976, pursuant to the Congressional Budget and Impoundment Control Act.

titles.title: A bill to provide authorization of activities and appropriations for the Department of the Interior for the period commencing July 1, 1976, and ending on September 30, 1976, in conformance to the requirements of section 502(a) of the Congressional Budget and Impoundment Control Act of 1974 (P.L. 93-344).
